alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dunklin County through 445 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Campbell, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malden, Campbell, Clarkton, St. Francis, Glennonville, Valley Ridge, Providence, Morris State Park, Wilhelmina, Brian, Baird, McGuires and Townley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
